CP General: CP Should the IP for API access be checked?
General: Should the IP for API access be checked?

CP General: CP This applies to the tracking as well as the marketplace integration or the repricing.
General: This applies to the tracking, to marketplace integration and to the repricing.

CP General: CP Protect your data feed with a password. For example: 'www.testshop.com/channelpilot?password=12345'
General: Protect your data feed with a password. For example: 'www.testshop.com/channelpilot?password=12345'

CP General: CP Select the data fields you want to provide on ChannelPilot. Some product attributes are always included. (Entity_Id, Sku, name, description, price, manufacturer, color, categories, product_url, image_url, additional_image_1, additional_image_2, additional_image_3, weight)
General: Select the data fields you would like to provide ChannelPilot. Some data fields are permanently included within the product catalogue. (Entity_Id, Sku, name, description, price, manufacturer, color, categories, product_url, image_url, etc.)

CP General: CP Set up additional data fields. These fields have for every product the same value. E.g. for additional delivery costs.
General: Set up additional data fields with static product values i.e. For additional delivery costs.

CP General: CP Select the data fields you want to be overwritten by the respective value of the parent article.
General: Select the data fields you would like the parent item to replace

CP General: CP How many additional productimages should be exported?
General: How many additional productimages should be exported?

CP General: CP This field would be overwritten by the new product price.
General: This price field will be replaced by the new price

CP General: CP Save prices net or gross?
CP !!!This is no real payment method!!!
This shipping method is currently unavailable.
General: This shipping method is currently unavailable.

CP General: CP Show Method if Not Applicable
CP Use Admin Mode for order import
General: Use Admin Mode for order import

CP General: CP When importing marketplace orders you can use the admin mode. When choosing the admin mode please note that all checks are disabled thar are normally applied, like: ordering a product which amount is less than the configured minimum allowed quantity in shopping cart, import orders which have products that are sold out or the available amount is less than the ordered amount.
General: CP When importing marketplace orders you can use the admin mode. When choosing the admin mode please note that all checks are disabled thar are normally applied, like: ordering a product which amount is less than the configured minimum allowed quantity in shopping cart, import orders which have products that are sold out or the available amount is less than the ordered amount.

CP General: CP If you choose the indexed method, make sure that the 'Channelpilot Product Feed Export' index is always up to date. Please note, that if you select more than 40 data fields, that the indexed method will be used regardless of the selected option.
General: If you choose the indexed method, make sure that the 'Channelpilot Product Feed Export' index is always up to date. Please note, that if you select more than 40 data fields, that the indexed method will be used regardless of the selected option.

CP General: CP Index product data for the Channelpilot product feed export
General: Index product data for the Channelpilot product feed export

CP General: CP You have added more than %s data fields for the product feed export. Please note that with this amount the 'indexed' export method will re used regardless of the selected one. Keep in mind that you have to keep the ChannelPilot Product Feed Export index up to date.
General: You have added more than %s data fields for the product feed export. Please note that with this amount the 'indexed' export method will re used regardless of the selected one. Keep in mind that you have to keep the ChannelPilot Product Feed Export index up to date.

CP General: CP Showing feed export data for product %s and store %s - Created at: %s
General: Showing feed export data for product %s and store %s - Created at: %s

CP General: CP The data has been deleted. Please reindex the export data.
General: The data has been deleted. Please reindex the export data.

CP General: CP Warning, this will delete all entries and the data has to be reindexed. Proceed ?
General: Warning, this will delete all entries and the data has to be reindexed. Do you wish to proceed ?
